title: Return Ticket to Stockholm
description: 17 CompleteRyo is no-one in particular leading a nothing-much life, until he's snatched off the street, and held in a characterless hotel room. There's not one person in the world who will even miss him. Ryo's minder, Blainn, explains an organised crime syndicate think he's an undercover cop who may have seen something he shouldn't. But if that's so, why haven't they killed him yet? Exactly who is the mysterious Brennan, and what does he want? And is being held indefinitely the worst thing that could happen, or is that intead being let go?CONTENT contains m/m and scenes of dubious sexual consent.
author: attackegg
